sys_update_version.name: sp_header_footer_914f9d621bf9e910c2e1433be54bcb5e
sys_update_version.payload: customc.navbar { transition: 250ms opacity ease-in-out; -webkit-transition: 250ms opacity ease-in-out; border: 0; border-bottom: 4px solid $sp-navbar-divider-color; } .navbar-fade { opacity: 0.4; } .navbar-inverse .navbar-toggle { border-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25); } header[role="banner"], .nav > li > a { max-height: 60px; } @media screen and (max-width: 768px){ .nav > li > a { padding-right: 0.5rem; padding-left: 0.5rem; } } .navbar-brand { max-height: 60px; padding: 0; padding-bottom: 0.5rem; } .navbar-brand img, .navbar-brand span { margin-left: $sp-logo-margin-x; margin-right: $sp-logo-margin-x; margin-top: $sp-logo-margin-y; margin-bottom: $sp-logo-margin-y; display: block; max-height: $sp-logo-max-height; max-width: $sp-logo-max-width; position: relative; top: 50%; -webkit-transform: translateY(-50%); -ms-transform: translateY(-50%); transform: translateY(-50%); } .breadcrumb-container { background-color: $panel-bg; } /* for mobile app */ .navbar-inverse.is-native { background-color: #405060; } nav{ margin-bottom: 0px; border-radius: 0px; } .navbar-collapse{ padding-right: 0px; } .navbar-nav { margin: 0px; } sp_instancefalsefalse 0) $(this).removeClass('in').addClass('collapse'); }); }]]> CSM Stock Header - Liebherrtruefalsefalsesp_header_footeradmin2023-03-28 13:17:37914f9d621bf9e910c2e1433be54bcb5e0 CSM Stock Header - Liebherr80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f396192680d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926sp_header_footer_914f9d621bf9e910c2e1433be54bcb5eadmin2023-03-28 13:17:37
